summary: In British East Africa, a fatal triangle develops involving a frustrated wife, a weak and coward husband, and an English big-game hunter who comes between the couple.
cast: Gregory Peck|Joan Bennett|Robert Preston|Reginald Denny|Jean Gillie|Carl Harbord|Earl Smith|Frederick Worlock|Vernon Downing|Darby Jones|Hassan Said|Martin Wilkins
